b.font: Welcome, Byenvini, Bienvenido, እንኳን ደህና መጡ, Bem Vinda

div.div: RT @Ms_Robbie: It's time for our #thirdgrade iReady Star of the Week! This student has spent almost 9 hours on #iReady this week!… https://t.co/3XCF3A8imS
RT @MsDanahy: What’s happening in Kindergarten? Amazing subtraction stories, Poetry writing,and engaging work displaying the phas… https://t.co/mC38qAJPAb

div.p: The Banneker is a high performing urban K1-6 STEM School, committed to excellence in education. We believe all students can excel as learners and citizens when provided a rich supportive, and stimulating educational environment. The Banneker is the inspiration of concerned community leaders, parents, and educators, with the common vision and purpose of providing all Cambridge and local youth, regardless of race, culture, language, or socioeconomic status with a high quality education.

div.span: Benjamin Banneker Charter Public School, 21 Notre Dame Ave, Cambridge, MA, 02140, USA

div.p: The Benjamin Banneker Charter Public School is a Title 1 School.

Please email recordsofficer@banneker.org to report inaccessible content or if you have questions or concerns about accessing information on this website. Complaint procedures, Freedom of Information Act Requests (FOIA), and filing formal grievances under Section 504 can be found on our website accessibility page.
Icons generated by flaticon.com under CC. The authors are: Freepik.
